name: Create project build configuration as generated user
description: Super-admin creates new user, new user creates project, project build configuration

steps.name: Create test user with fake user-data, generate fake project data

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/users with data: {'username': 'court', 'password': 'Btc06YsZH6a', 'email': 'jwilliamson@example.com', 'roles': {'role': [{'roleId': 'PROJECT_ADMIN', 'scope': 'g'}]}}, expected_status: 200
Auth user with creds: "('court', 'Btc06YsZH6a')" and get csrf token
Sending GET request to http://localhost:8111/authenticationTest.html?csrf with data: None, expected_status: 200
Send request to create new project

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/projects with data: {'parentProject': {'locator': '_Root'}, 'name': 'born', 'id': 'O4uImGo8X4V', 'copyAllAssociatedSettings': True}, expected_status: 200
Check if generated fake project ID: "O4uImGo8X4V" equals ID from respond "O4uImGo8X4V"
Create build conf for created project O4uImGo8X4V

Create build configuration with data: {'id': 'dsgGFOUDQYK', 'name': 'yet', 'project': {'id': 'O4uImGo8X4V'}, 'steps': {'name': 'various', 'type': 'however', 'properties': {'property': [{'name': 'script.content', 'value': "echo 'Hello World!'"}, {'name': 'teamcity.step.mode', 'value': 'default'}, {'name': 'use.custom.script', 'value': 'true'}]}}}

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/buildTypes with data: {'id': 'dsgGFOUDQYK', 'name': 'yet', 'project': {'id': 'O4uImGo8X4V'}, 'steps': {'name': 'various', 'type': 'however', 'properties': {'property': [{'name': 'script.content', 'value': "echo 'Hello World!'"}, {'name': 'teamcity.step.mode', 'value': 'default'}, {'name': 'use.custom.script', 'value': 'true'}]}}}, expected_status: 200
Check if created fake build conf ID: "dsgGFOUDQYK" equals ID from respond "dsgGFOUDQYK"

labels.name: story
labels.value: As project admin create build configuration
